DOC.brief_summary: The purpose non-inferiority study compare effectiveness two induction chemotherapy regimen ( cytarabine plus idarubicin [ AI ] versus cytarabine plus high-dose daunorubicin [ AD ] ) AML . The effectiveness evaluate term complete remission ( CR ) rate .
DOC.brief_title: Idarubicin Versus High Dose Daunorubicin Acute Myelogenous Leukemia ( AML )
